meta.description: Operational principles for building and running agent-native OODA wave systems.

principles.name: Context Is Bandwidth
principles.title: Treat context budget as a hard systems resource
principles.statement: Orientation token budget is equivalent to bounded channel capacity; waste reduces decision quality.

principles.name: Structured Over Narrative
principles.title: Prefer typed envelopes over prose
principles.statement: Typed payloads reduce ambiguity, improve replay, and make policy gating tractable.

principles.name: Digest-First Transport
principles.title: Ship references before blobs
principles.statement: Prefer hashes and references to reduce bandwidth and improve dedupe.

principles.name: Canonical Ordering
principles.title: Determinism requires stable sort order
principles.statement: All set-like collections must use deterministic ordering in storage and replay.

principles.name: Transactional Boundaries
principles.title: Bind state updates atomically
principles.statement: Claim/update/receipt transitions must occur in explicit transactions at each boundary.

principles.name: Crash-Only Discipline
principles.title: Assume process death at any instruction
principles.statement: All runtime progress must be recoverable from durable state without memory dependence.

principles.name: Leases Are Safety Rails
principles.title: Use leases for concurrency control
principles.statement: Exclusive leased ownership is simpler and safer than lock-free ad hoc claim semantics.

principles.name: Idempotency by Construction
principles.title: Derive stable idempotency keys
principles.statement: Effects should be dedupe-safe under retries and replay.

principles.name: Fail Closed Above Tier 1
principles.title: Ambiguity is denial for high-risk paths
principles.statement: If risk is high and trust/evidence is uncertain, default must deny.

principles.name: Capability Narrowing
principles.title: Delegation can only attenuate
principles.statement: Child execution scopes must be strict subsets of parent authority.

principles.name: No Ambient Privilege
principles.title: Environment is untrusted authority
principles.statement: Never infer authorization from process locality alone.

principles.name: Namespace Identity
principles.title: Identity from trusted boundary
principles.statement: Use host-derived namespace identity for agent intents.

principles.name: Decision Commitment
principles.title: Persist plan before external action
principles.statement: Outbox action records are the canonical decision commitment.

principles.name: Actuation Receipts
principles.title: Execution must produce machine receipts
principles.statement: Every external call outcome should be represented as structured receipt data.

principles.name: Error Taxonomy First
principles.title: Classify before retry
principles.statement: Retries require explicit retryability classes, not generic exception handling.

principles.name: DLQ Is a Feature
principles.title: Poison work must terminate safely
principles.statement: Dead-letter queues preserve availability and operator visibility.

principles.name: Bounded Fanout
principles.title: Observation scale requires hard caps
principles.statement: Observe phase must enforce job count, timeout, and concurrency limits.

principles.name: Shed Early
principles.title: Drop low-value work before overload
principles.statement: Backpressure should prefer sacrificing low-priority observations.

principles.name: Mandatory Context Floors
principles.title: Never starve identity/objective/constraint bands
principles.statement: Essential context cannot be traded away by dynamic optimization.

principles.name: Elastic Context Allocation
principles.title: Spend leftover budget by utility
principles.statement: After mandatory floors, allocate tokens by scored value with diversity constraints.

principles.name: Profile Version Pinning
principles.title: Wave execution sees immutable profile version
principles.statement: Orientation profile changes apply to future waves, not in-flight waves.

principles.name: Adaptation via Proposals
principles.title: No direct mutable tuning of active policy
principles.statement: Agent adaptation must pass proposal and guard validation workflow.

principles.name: Horizon-Bound Changes
principles.title: Prefer temporary policy experiments
principles.statement: Apply adaptive profile changes for N waves before promotion.

principles.name: Rollback Ready
principles.title: Every adaptation needs safe revert
principles.statement: Policy and profile evolution must define explicit rollback triggers.

principles.name: Metric Anti-Gaming
principles.title: Scorecards need countermetrics
principles.statement: Optimize with paired metrics to resist Goodhart-style drift.

principles.name: Trace-Lineage Completeness
principles.title: Causal graph over logs
principles.statement: Trace IDs must connect event, wave, action, receipt, and audit records.

principles.name: Latency as Policy Input
principles.title: Performance affects correctness
principles.statement: Tail latency and queue depth should influence gating and degradation behavior.

principles.name: One-Way Privilege Escalation Ban
principles.title: No implicit escalation from context
principles.statement: Context content alone cannot elevate capability.

principles.name: Strong Defaults
principles.title: Fail-closed startup posture
principles.statement: Missing runtime policy must resolve to safe deny or low-impact fallback.

principles.name: Operator Interpretability
principles.title: Human-readable summaries from machine state
principles.statement: Operational views should derive from structured state, not ad hoc text logs.

principles.name: Schema Evolution Discipline
principles.title: Version schemas explicitly
principles.statement: Breaking schema changes require epoch markers and migration strategy.

principles.name: Replay as Regression Test
principles.title: Historic traces are test fixtures
principles.statement: Production traces should be replayed in CI to validate determinism and migrations.

principles.name: Adapter Contract Completeness
principles.title: No opaque adapters
principles.statement: Every adapter declares retries, idempotency, scope, and failure taxonomy.

principles.name: Evidence Before Promotion
principles.title: Claims require receipts
principles.statement: High-impact claims are non-authoritative without receipt binding.

principles.name: Minimal Trusted Computing Base
principles.title: Keep kernel small
principles.statement: Authorization and state-transition logic should remain compact and testable.

principles.name: Asymmetric Safety
principles.title: Be stricter on writes than reads
principles.statement: Mutation paths require stronger validation than observation paths.

principles.name: Budget-Aware Reasoning
principles.title: Reason with explicit compute budgets
principles.statement: Decision routines should consume declared token/time/tool-call budgets.

principles.name: Prompt Hygiene
principles.title: Context compilation beats concatenation
principles.statement: Do not append arbitrary history; compile semantically bounded packets.

principles.name: Feedback as Data
principles.title: Learning uses structured feedback
principles.statement: Post-action learning should consume typed quality signals and operator annotations.

principles.name: Source Diversity
principles.title: Avoid monoculture orientation
principles.statement: Orientation compiler should enforce diversity to reduce blind spots.

principles.name: Staleness Awareness
principles.title: Time-decay signals matter
principles.statement: Fact utility should decay with age unless anchored by durable relevance.

principles.name: High-Risk Human Checkpoint
principles.title: Keep reversible human control
principles.statement: T3 actions require explicit approval or emergency policy exception.

principles.name: Token Secret Hygiene
principles.title: Store hashes, never raw bearer tokens
principles.statement: Capability secret storage should use one-way digests and strict rotation.

principles.name: Bootstrap Reduction
principles.title: Minimize root capability exposure
principles.statement: Root credentials are bootstrap-only and should be revoked after scoped issuance.

principles.name: Temporal Locality
principles.title: Prefer recent relevant evidence
principles.statement: Orientation quality improves when recency is modeled explicitly in scoring.

principles.name: Cold-Start Safety
principles.title: Startup must be safe with empty caches
principles.statement: Missing warm state should reduce functionality, not reduce safeguards.

principles.name: Compensation Over Silence
principles.title: Handle irreversible failures explicitly
principles.statement: When rollback is impossible, emit compensating workflows and operator alerts.

principles.name: Recurrence Reduction
principles.title: Defects must strengthen the factory
principles.statement: Counterexamples should result in stronger guards, contracts, or primitives.

principles.name: Bounded Utility With Reversible First Moves
principles.title: Maximize progress while preserving option value
principles.statement: Under uncertainty, choose actions that maximize expected mission value subject to hard safety constraints while preferring reversible probes before irreversible commitments.

principles.name: Calibrated Causal Updating
principles.title: Update beliefs from interventions, not correlation alone
principles.statement: Decision confidence should be calibrated and revised using causal evidence, counterfactual checks, and explicit uncertainty accounting.

principles.name: Adversarial Incentive Robustness
principles.title: Design for strategic manipulation resistance
principles.statement: Assume external actors can optimize against policy; require mechanism and gate designs that remain safe under spoofing, coercion, and incentive gaming.

principles.name: Empathic Multi-Objective Alignment
principles.title: Optimize safety, autonomy, dignity, and fairness together
principles.statement: Guardian decisions should trade off multiple human values explicitly, with extra protection for vulnerable users and transparent rationale when objectives conflict.

principles.name: Governance Under Strategic Uncertainty
principles.title: Use explicit conflict resolution and phased commitments
principles.statement: When laws, delegates, or signals conflict, apply deterministic meta-policy and phased commitments that can be audited, challenged, and refined after action.
